    • Method Detail

      • withPartitionKey

        public CreateTableStatementBuilder.Buildable withPartitionKey(java.lang.String columnName,
                                                              DataType dataType)
        Adds a partition key column definition. This includes the column declaration (you don't need an additional withColumn(String, DataType) or withColumns(Map) call). Partition key columns are added in the order of their declaration.
        Parameters:
        columnName - the column name of the partition key column
        dataType - the data type of the partition key column
        Returns:
        a builder object

      • withPartitionKey

        public CreateTableStatementBuilder.Buildable withPartitionKey(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,DataType> columnNameAndDataTypeMap)
        Adds partition key column definitions. This includes the column declarations (you don't need an additional withColumn(String, DataType) or withColumns(Map) call). Partition key columns are added in the order of their declaration.
        Parameters:
        columnNameAndDataTypeMap - a map of the column names and the data types of the partition key columns
        Returns:
        a builder object

      • withClusteringKey

        public CreateTableStatementBuilder.Buildable withClusteringKey(java.lang.String columnName,
                                                               DataType dataType)
        Adds a clustering key column definition. This includes the column declaration (you don't need an additional withColumn(String, DataType) or withColumns(Map) call). Clustering key columns are added in the order of their declaration.
        Parameters:
        columnName - the column name of the clustering key column
        dataType - the data type of the clustering key column
        Returns:
        a builder object
